name: turboactivate
description: Add TurboActivate to your app to sell copies of your software to your customers. TurboActivate is our premium, affordable, node-locked licensing (a.k.a. hardware-locked licensing) for macOS, Windows, Linux, and BSD. TurboActivate allows you to add timed-trials to your app as well. Also, see our 'turbofloat' package.
author: wyDay, LLC
